name: @cumulus/update-granules-cmr-metadata-file-links
description: Update CMR metadata files with correct online access urls and etags and transfer etag info to granules' CMR files

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack
scripts.package: npm run build && (cd dist && node ../../../bin/zip.js lambda.zip index.js schemas)
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R schemas dist/ && ../../node_modules/.bin/webpack --progress -w

author: Cumulus Authors
